title: Episode 36: Science of Deception
description: This week on Hidden Brain, we find out what makes humans of all ages cheat. Plus in Stopwatch Science, Dan Pink comes armed with studies on how our social context influences our cheating habits.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
